Hersbach2020.title: The ERA5 global reanalysis
Hersbach2020.summary: Describes ERA5, a comprehensive reanalysis providing hourly data on many atmospheric parameters. It assimilates vast amounts of historical observations. Key for ground truth in high-altitude profiling.
Hersbach2020.results: Significantly improved accuracy in the stratosphere compared to ERA-Interim.

Lam2023.title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
Lam2023.summary: Introduces GraphCast, a GNN-based weather forecasting model. Demonstrates that ML can outperform traditional NWP in some metrics.
Lam2023.results: State-of-the-art performance for 10-day forecasts, capturing vertical structure effectively.

Dirksen2014.title: Reference quality upper-air measurements: GRUAN data processing for the Vaisala RS92 radiosonde
Dirksen2014.summary: Details the processing and uncertainty quantification for GRUAN radiosonde data. Critical for understanding input data limitations.
Dirksen2014.results: Established reference quality profiles for validation.
